answers.answer: I honestly am not on a diet, but I try not to eat too much pasta or rice and stuff like that, and I'm on insulin and when I hit the third trimester, my fasting sugar levels were on 140, when I usually had it on the 80s, but now I'm on a pill too besides the insulin and is getting better

Towards the beginning my highest blood sugar ever was 191 - but I ate McDonald's chicken nuggets with a regular large coke... for the most part my blood sugar is diet controlled however I do take a low dose of medication for my fasting blood sugars because they were in the low to mid 90's with meds fasting ate noe between 75-85

question: For all you of u that have gestastional diabetes, what is the highest your sugar has ever been? And are u on medication or s it diet controlled ?
title: gb-high sugars
